## FetchRemotePageInfoMessage interface

A message sent \*from\* the content script \*to\* the background script asking for pageInfo to be fetched from some API endpoint.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface FetchRemotePageInfoMessage extends MessageBase<'fetch_remote_page_info'> 
```
